author: Eddie

review: I've been a loyal Roku user since the 2050x model, but with all the changes in streaming, I started to look around. I tried Chromecast, but ended up not liking it for various reasons.  As a Prime member, the Amazon Fire TV Stick looked like a good option. I read various reviews on the earlier models of Fire TV and that it had been improved recently.  I am very glad I switched!! The usability, speed, access to Prime content (video and music), and overall quality are amazing!!  If I were not a Prime member, I would still recommend the Fire TV Stick, but the integration with Amazon Prime is a big plus.
author: ri music guy
